pullRequest.title: Update additional JPA FATs to use test framework library project.
pullRequest.bodyText: Update additional JPA FAT buckets to use the test framework library project as well as more clearly passing Exceptions to junit runner.

commit.message:
Update additional JPA FATs to use test framework library project.

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Copyright should include 2 years.... 1st year delivered, and last year modified (unless same as 1st year).... so this should be :
Copyright (c) 2019, 2020 IBM Corporation and others.

Probably true for most of the files where you've changed the copyright.
